name: Vladislav Delay
description: '''Vladislav Delay''' is the most frequently used [[pseudonym]] of '''Sasu Ripatti''' (born 1976), a [[Finland|Finnish]] [[electronic music]]ian. He has also recorded as '''Luomo''', '''Sistol''', '''Uusitalo,''' '''Conoco,''' and '''Ripatti''', working in styles such as [[minimal techno]], [[glitch music|glitch]], and [[house music|house]].
